articles.author: Jamie Klein
articles.title: IMSA drivers defend ‘Americanised’ Le Mans safety car changes - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Drivers from the IMSA SportsCar Championship have spoken in defence of the new safety car rules at the Le Mans 24 Hours following heavy criticism from Toyota.
articles.content: Toyota Gazoo Racing Europe technical director Pascal Vasselon caused a stir following the official Test Day when he described the new rules, which will see the entire 62-car field packed up behind a … [+4223 chars]
